'''Hydro Mimic Cranes''' are [[Hydro Mimics]] summoned by the [[Oceanid]], but can also be encountered on their own in the [[Spiral Abyss]] or during [[Quests]]. They resemble normal [[Azure Crane]]s. They take more damage from {{Electro}} attacks.

{{Enemy Stats

|atk_type     = 2
}}

==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''Torrential Waves:''' Flaps its wings and shoots a long-range wave straight at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} on hit.
*'''Backstep:''' If the player gets too close to the crane, they may back off.
